comments: He talks and talks and is very unclear when giving assignments. He is a tough grader. He does have a sense of humor. Very bad at explaining assignments and what he wants. When student\'s asked for help he just told them their papers were wrong. The whole class was questioning if they were even passing.

comments: Attendance is a must! He takes attendace right on the minute. He can be lengthy in lectures but overall I enjoyed his class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  CARING  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: I admit I was a little afraid at first, as my friend had him and said he was tough. But I enjoyed his class very much. He made me challenge myself to become a better writer. He taught me how to read literature and how to analyze. I am glad I had him. I got an A but I worked for it.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)

comments: The class was not difficult at all. I actually enjoyed it! Just follow directions, ask question, show your\'e interested, and you\'ll be fine. At first I was hesitant to take this professor because of the bad reviews. However, I was pleasantly surprised!! Not too many tests. I think the work he gives and the way he grades is fair. Take him!

comments: Awesome Course. Mr.Hendrickson is very knowledgeable , i was a poor writer but like others said brought the best out of me. Give the professor what he asks and you will succeed, wish i cud have tooken him for 102

comments: He\'s a good teacher. He\'s helpful and tries his best to help you out. The only thing I didn\'t like was that he expected you to write about something new cause he\'s tired of reading the same stuff over and over. He\'s there when you need him. He doesn\'t want any late work. He makes you work a lot.

comments: A great overall teacher he provided a different point of veiw on topics and really appreciated others input. He is also a very motivating professor who brought the best out of my work
